title: 错误
author: 穿拖鞋的男孩
txt_content:
我打开mc进入世界后玩没一会后会出现错误报告
15 mods loaded
Minecraft Forge 3.2.4.114
FML v2.1.28.95
Forge Mod Loader version 2.1.28.95 for Minecraft 1.2.5
 mod_ModLoaderMp : Available (minecraft.jar)
 mod_MinecraftForge : Available (minecraft.jar)
 mod_Speedblock : Available (minecraft.jar)
 mod_TooManyItems : Available (minecraft.jar)
 mod_Arrows : Available (minecraft.jar)
 mod_Guns : Available (minecraft.jar)
 mod_DimensionAPI : Available (minecraft.jar)
 mod_SpaceCraft : Available (minecraft.jar)
 mod_ClayMan : Available (1.25粘土人汉化.zip)
 mod_ReiMinimap : Available ([1.2.5]ReiMinimap_v3.1.zip)
 mod_Decoratives : Available (Decoratives_Mod_1.4.2.zip)
 mod_Zeppelin : Available (mod_Zeppelin-client-1.2.5.0.31.zip)
 mod_AnimalBikes : Available (modloader_animalbikes_1.2.5_v2.zip)
 mod_printerblock : Available (PrinterBlock_1.2.5%呆强强汉化.zip)
 mod_StuffedAnimals : Available (Stuffed Animals.zip)

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.


--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 2afd9305 --------
Generated 12-7-7 下午1:09
Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
OS: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
Java: 1.6.0_32, Sun Microsystems Inc.
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: GeForce GT 430/PCI/SSE2 version 4.1.0, NVIDIA Corporation
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: ame.canBlockCatchFire(Lali;IIII)Z
 at vl.f(RenderBlocks.java:1388)
 at vl.b(RenderBlocks.java:387)
 at ct.a(WorldRenderer.java:211)
 at l.a(RenderGlobal.java:1482)
 at lr.a(EntityRenderer.java:1070)
 at lr.b(EntityRenderer.java:907)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.x(Minecraft.java:873)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:750)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 5985ad96 ----------
求解

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content:
嗯……具体不明……
但建议升级到JAVA7，某些mod对JAVA6兼容不好

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
http://115.com/file/c26t0d7p#
ame.class

放minecraft.jar里替换吧，这是原版的，估计你是装了某个Fire Mod

replies.author: jackwey
replies.txt_content: 是因為你在你的世界裏面碰到了不可以用的MOD,所以強關了，你可以刪除那個MOD,就可以玩了
